title: Diana believes in vaccinations
body: How else would she develop an im*moon*ity?

replies.body: One can recognize a bad pun by even member of Riot staff having the obligation to respond.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j9PtbQxM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-31T21:27:08.999+0000)
>
> One can recognize a bad pun by even member of Riot staff having the obligation to respond.

It was so painful that even a rioteer reacted.

And they have the endurance to not even glance at a lot stuff on the boards xD
Take your upvote and leave before the chairs start flying.

she still gets sick

only once in a blue m
